Title: From out of the Rain
Plot: An old cinema reopens and mysterious horrors of the past return to Cardiff.  Why are people trapped between life and death, questions are asked about the Night Travellers, and what Torchwood can do to stop them.
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence,horror scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Julian Bleach, Caroline Sheen, Camilla Power, Stephen Marzella, Hazel Wyn Williams, Lowri Sian Jones, Anwen Carlisle, Yasmin Wilde, Craig Gallivan, Eileen Essell, Alastair Sill, Catherine Olding
